Would this be for openglad-E? Because I would be all for that!

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Paul Hightower" 
<dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> I was wondering how many people would be interested in 
> participating in a scenario of the month contest.  The idea is 
> somebody picks a theme and participants design a scenario within a 
> month's time around that theme.  At the end of the month, we'd use 
a 
> poll to vote on the best scenario around picked theme for the month.
> 
> If there is enough interest, it would be a group decision on the 
theme 
> of the month unless somebody else has a better way to pick the 
theme.
